Hero.title: Our Services
Hero.subtitle: Delivering comprehensive electrical and electronic solutions for the modern maritime industry.

repair.title: Fault Detection & Repair
repair.description: We utilize advanced diagnostic tools to identify and rectify electrical faults efficiently, minimizing vessel downtime.

installation.title: Electrical System Installation
installation.description: From main switchboards to distribution panels, we handle complete electrical system installations for new builds and retrofits.

cabling.title: Cabling
cabling.description: Professional marine cabling services, ensuring safety and compliance with international maritime standards.

automation.title: Automation & System Modifications
automation.description: Upgrading and modifying alarm monitoring systems, power management systems, and engine control systems.

panel.title: Panel Manufacturing & Installation
panel.description: Custom design and manufacturing of main switchboards, starter panels, and distribution boards.

lighting.title: Lighting & Ex-proof Solutions
lighting.description: Installation and maintenance of navigation lights, deck lighting, and explosion-proof equipment for hazardous areas.

communication.title: Communication Systems
communication.description: Setup and maintenance of internal communication systems, PA systems, and network infrastructure.

energy.title: Energy Consumption Analysis
energy.description: Installation of kWh meters and analysis of power consumption to optimize energy efficiency.

Feature.title: Advanced Panel Manufacturing
Feature.description: Our state-of-the-art facility allows us to design and manufacture custom electrical panels that meet the specific needs of your vessel. We ensure all our products comply with class society regulations and international standards.
